content: चारः [चर एव अण्] {@--1@} Going, walking, gait, wandering about; मंडलचारशीघ्रः <ls>V. 5. 2</ls>; क्रीडाशैले यदि च विचरेत् पादचारेण गौरी <ls>Me. 60</ls> walk on foot. {@--2@} Motion, course, progression; मंगलचार; शनिचार, राहु° &c. {@--3@} A spy, scout, secret emissary; <ls>Ms. 7. 184</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">9. 261</ls>; see चारचक्षुस् below. {@--4@} Performing, practising. {@--5@} A prison. {@--6@} A bond, fetter. --रं An artificial poison.
